website_summaries.verdict: A rich styling cream with coconut oil and other quality ingredient that will produce excellent results with just a few drops. If your curls are tight, chances are you will be impressed with the results it delivers.
pros: Moisturizes curls with a paraben-free, sulfate-free formula that's enriched with coconut oil
Works best on tight curls and coiled locks
Also adds volume to fine hair
A small amount delivers maximum benefits
cons: Although it controls frizz for most users, a few have reported that it didn't tame their hair as expected

customer_reviews.title: Amazon needs to stop this seller from selling period
customer_reviews.text: I also received a bottle with the cap off. No way to pump it. Will have to scoop out but wonder what this stuff actually is. Possibly ruining my hair. Amazon needs to stop this seller they are crooks.
customer_reviews.author: carlos vides

customer_reviews.title: Both containers were broken
customer_reviews.text: Both of the lids and pumps on both containers were broken. Instead of the lid coming off the entire top, pump and all came off. It makes me wonder if I’m even buying Deva curl cream and that it’s something else placed in one of their containers. I’m not able to entirely snap the tops back in and neither pump works. I buy Deva products all the time, but I won’t be buying from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: marcha

customer_reviews.title: Magic cream!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product says it provides hold, definition and , moisture. I don’t know how but it literally does all 3 amazingly!!! This is the holy grail. I’ve been natural for over 10 years and have yet to find a product for wash and gos that I really had good results with until now ! I’m amazed at how good it is. I have 3c/4a hair . I wish I tried this years ago. And it works great on wet or dry hair . I prefer wet. LOVE IT! My new go to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO worth the hype!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't wanna like this so bad cause it's kind of expensive, but I've tried SO many curly hair products and this one is seriously the best curl cream. It leaves your hair shiny, soft, and defined all at the same time and idk how. And for everybody saying it makes your hair frizzy... on its own your hair will get like that but pair it with any gel and LET ME TELL YOU it is bomb.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: NOT AUTHENTIC
customer_reviews.text: Should have known better Deva Curl is always full price! Didn’t realize until I purchased another one at an authorized retailer and the difference was undeniable. BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Lola1

customer_reviews.title: Please be careful with these products!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to see the results others have had. It dried out my hair leaving no moisture. Brittle and very tangled. But the worst has been hair loss. I am devastated. My hair has thinned out so much that my scalp is very visible!
customer_reviews.author: L. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Not Devacurl Supercream- Truemark
customer_reviews.text: This product (filled by truemark) is a fake- it's packaged like supercream but is 100% not. It dried out my hair and smells like faint coconut and alcohol. DO NOT BUY IT FROM THIS SELLER! Spend the regular 23 dollars that supercream costs and save your hair and the 14 dollars that you would have spent on this, just to throw it away. They will not let you return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go-to for awesome curls.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cream. I used to use it as the last product on my dry hair, but I’ve recently started using it as the first product on my soaking-wet hair and WOW! More definition and soft curls. I was a little concerned that I’d received an old product because there was a sticker with a bar code on the side that clearly belonged to Amazon, but since I didn’t notice any diminished performance, I wrote it off as being a part of their inventory tracking. Curly girls, get this product. It’s so much more expensive in salons, so just try it! At this price, it’s too cheap to have anything to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Jean

customer_reviews.title: Love this cream
customer_reviews.text: If you have curly hair don’t hesitate to buy this... I have very curly frizzy damaged hair that I have just now started taking care of about a year ago.. devacurl has been a staple in my regimen it is very lightweight and leaves my hair beautiful and rejuvenated!!! I have never had more compliments in my life. All I do is shower and apply generous amounts of product mostly to my ends and I have bouncy curls that don’t harden like typical mouse! My boyfriend loves my curls and even prompts me to buy more devacurl when I run out because he loves it so much. Click buy right now you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Melyssa

customer_reviews.title: I have fine wavy hair and this was recommend to me by ...
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work for me. I have fine wavy hair and this was recommend to me by my hairdresser. She said she loved it on her curls. It made her curls look great. She has nice S defined curls. For my hair it just weighed it down and looked dull. I thought it would help control the frizziness of my waves but it doesn't help with that at all. I wouldn't recommend this for anyone with hair like mine.
customer_reviews.author: VCK

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for 3b/c Curls!!!  Worth the Investment!
customer_reviews.text: Must have for 3b/c Curls!!! I use this product along with other Deva Curl products to give me full controlled perfect curls! I use in the following way: Deva Curl Product Order: 1. Deva Curl Shampoo and Conditioner (every other day) co-wash with conditioner only if necessary (listen to your curls) 2. B'Leave-in Curl Plumper 3. Frizz Free Volumizing Foam 4. Super Cream or Styling Cream (Define and Control) 5. Arc Angel Gel 6. Diffuser on low/cool heat Worth the investment! I have long hair and it lasts forever! Watch YouTube videos to see how it should be applied!
customer_reviews.author: Marisha Vandenberg

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY ANY DIVA CURL PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: This product will make your hair fall out! I purchase this product, then my teenage daughter showed me dozens of woman who have lost chunks of hair. It you google Diva curl lawsuit, you’ll see that as if February 2020, a class action lawsuit has been filed by dozens of women. You will also see and hear all the awful stories and you tubes. Of course as soon as I received the product, they refused to refund me. It was bought on Amazon, by third party. So buyer beware...
customer_reviews.author: Tracy McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Do your own research and use product as directed
customer_reviews.text: I know about the class A lawsuit but I personally have not had any issues using DevaCurl super cream. I looked into the Ingredients that are supposedly causing the scalp damage and hair loss and the only thing in this super cream would be fragrance that I recognize from the study. No sodium hydroxide or phenoxytanol. I have lost hair before due to Malibu treatment and i do not take this lightly, but my hair has been amazing for a year since i have been using DevaCurl. So for me it is a good product. Everyone needs to assess the risk for themselves and keep an eye on your hair closely while using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing! So of corse I use the “no pop” cleaning conditioner and the everyday conditioner, but after I wash my hair I add a couple of pumps into my hand and release the magic! I let my hair air dry, scrunching it here and there and once it’s dry... BAM!! Beautiful curls! Still a bit frizzy, but still beautiful. I’ve never felt more confident about my hair in my life. I use to straighten it, not anymore. Embrace your beauty and buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Addicted for life
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like crack in a bottle...it's awesome! Since I got a Deva cut and started using Deva Curl products I've noticed a tremendous difference in my hair, but the Supercream Coconut Cream Curl Styler is the best and my curls look great. I now have my staple go to products for my weekly wash session. I don't just recommend this product....I implore you to purchase it and see for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine0224lap

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic product for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair cream. Love it. Makes my curly hair look, feel, and smell amazing. Be careful not to use too much or you will have crunchy curls...which I do not like. One the second day, I spritz my hair with water and give it a few scrunches...good to go another day.
customer_reviews.author: T. Richards

customer_reviews.title: 3c to 4c curlies... you need this!
customer_reviews.text: A definite must have if you have 3c to 4c curls. This product is the perfect "one and done" styler. It does exactly what it says if you apply as stated. For a little extra hold for longevity, I strongly suggest DevaCurl's ARC ANGLE GEL. Without it, 2 days max for great curl definition. With it, 2 weeks...your call!
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed in packing/shipping no way to return
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and have ordered before but this time it was delivered completely destroyed and no means to return or write to ahipper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for my fine curls
customer_reviews.text: I have long, fine and curly hair. I tried the DevaCurl gel and this cream...both made my hair super dry and frizzy. Not sure why this works for so many others but for me, it was terrible. One day, hopefully I will find the miracle product for my hair! Oh and I can't return this...wish I would have known that or I would have purchased from another seller. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Cori Anne

customer_reviews.title: It works wonders on my frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the best styling cream I have found for my 3A type hair. I moved away from the Supercream to try other brands and products, but nothing works better for frizz and definition than the Supercream combined with the ArcAngel gel. By tying up my hair at night with a scrunchie and covering it with a Buff, I can get four days of shiny definition with only spraying some water on my hair for maintenance. I use leave-in conditioner, but the type of leave-in is not as important as the styling cream and gel. Of course, every curly girl has to find their own personal routine, but this is absolutely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Awwww yeah!
customer_reviews.text: This is my ish!!!!!!! My new favorite must have hair product. I'm a natural girl with 4b/4c texture hair. When my hair is getting frizzy I take a kettle of this and smooth it into the frizzy pieces and the piece curls right up! It only takes a little on your finger then press your finger to your thumb and run them down the piece of frizzy hair until it smooths out and curls it. I can stretch my style for a few more days using this. I love it so much I keep the travel size in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: nmakia1

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your $
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product instead of the DevaCurl Stlying Cream to save a a few bucks. This product is basically worthless...Does not hold a style and smell is extremely faint. Would NOT purchase this item again. Unfortunately, Truemark distributor does not accept returns, or I would have returned it for a refund. (I did not notice this when ordered, or I would have ordered from someone else). Will definitely return to using Styling Cream and pay the extra $.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Busted container
customer_reviews.text: Mine came busted. What a waste of money and I can't even send it back!!
customer_reviews.author: ALB

customer_reviews.title: BEST
customer_reviews.text: People have said negative things about deva curl products but I LOVE this coconut curl styler. Its the best ever. My hair looks, feels and smells amazing. No crunchiness. Soft curls. The key is to put it in while your hair is wet and do not touch your hair AT ALL while its drying then when its dry do a light scrunch with your hands and it should look amazing !
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Deva curl Supercross Coconut Curl Styler was and is a super find for me. My hair has gotten finer and thinner with age but it's still very curly. This Deva product works wonders. It does not weigh down my hair at all. I scrunch a pump or two into my hair. It is not sticky and does not leave my hair stiff and crunchy. It styles my hair the way I want and eliminates the frizzies.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Knock off of DevaCurl
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Deva Curl product for years and what I received WAS NOT Deva Curl. The reviews questioning the authenticity of this product (the tops completely off) are valid questions. The color and consistency don’t match Deva Curl. The smell is similar but off, it looks like the product was mixed with another. I have some DevaCurl I bought retail and I did a side by side comparison. Definitely different. Just a warning to other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best curly hair product ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything on the drug store and salon shelves to tame the frizzy curls. Just threw out all that ‘otc’ crap and am now hooked on this wonderful curl tamer! I like being able to run my fingers through my hair and not create frizz or run into crunchiness. It really doesn’t take much, so don’t be intimidated by the size of the bottle. My gf turned me onto the shampoo and conditioner back in January after I answered the door after a shower with fresh dry hair. I looked like a clown. Add this stuff and my hair is FINALLY soft and totally tamed. Oh, and it smells like coconut heaven lol!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package the product was sealed in a plastic bag and when I went to remove the cap the whole top came off - I love the smell and feel of the cream but I can not use the dispenser. I was so disappointed and this may have happened during shipping because the product wan only in a folded cardboard mailer. :( I hope someone can help me with this issue. I have added a picture for your review. Thanks Tonya Sexton
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Delivered with the top broken off and spilled inside packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is wonderful, however when opening the package after delivery it the top of the bottle was broken off and spilled all over inside the plastic bag it was in. I had to transfer the cream into a different product bottle that was empty. I’ve read in different reviews of this being a issue as well. Given I paid $15, I would like to be able to use all of it and not 80% of it.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Cogswell

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think they could do better than the original styling cream!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the Deva Styling Cream, so when they introduced the super cream I was skeptical. How could they make something better?! They did. It smells better, and it works better on my curls. I can style with Supercream alone and have the same curl control and shape as I get with the original styling cream plus gel.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimerika

customer_reviews.title: BEST to de-frizz curly hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I've used for my curly hair--it's low-cost and lasts for a long time. I have average thickness hair cut in layers down to my shoulder blades and use one pump. It doesn't make my hair take forever to dry and the more I use it, the better it looks! Believe me, I've used them all--including a long stint with Aveda's Be Curly--and this is the best of them. If I had more money, I'd use the whole line of products for shampoo and conditioner, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Beth Wade

customer_reviews.title: Delivered burst open. UPDATED.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: once I was able to clean off and reassemble, I tried this on my wet combination curl hair. It smells great and doesn’t leave my hair crunchy or frizzy. Not out of this world amazing, but did do a good job at defining my curls. May update product later after I actually use it. For now, 1 Star because this is how I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn N.

customer_reviews.title: READ-DO NOT BUY. THERE IS A CLASS ACTION LAWSUIT AGAINST THIS COMPANY.
customer_reviews.text: There is a form of formaldehyde in this product that is a known irritant and carcinogen. It's been destroying many women's curls, causing scalp and general skin irritation as well as hair loss. Deva curl has also been ridding their database of receipts so if you are to be unhappy with your results and wish to return whatever you purchased, you can not.
customer_reviews.author: Chandani P. Jayaratne

customer_reviews.title: Bouncing Curls Again!
customer_reviews.text: This. Is. Amazing. Pure and simple! Every morning I use to have to use a leave-in conditioner then use a mouse just to get my curls to not frizz. This product was a game changer! Grant it.... if you use to much your hair will look gross and greasy BUT if you find your perfect amount... WOW! I didn't know my hair could still have spiral curls and look frizz free/light & bouncy! 10/10 would reccomend for my curly & wavy haired friends
customer_reviews.author: Emily Schacht

customer_reviews.title: SILKY
customer_reviews.text: First off, i love this product!! It leaves my hair frizz free and silky. When I first started using it, it weighed down my hair. My problem was i was putting too much when I only needed a tad bit since my hair is wavy. Now my sister's hair is really curly, and she has to use a bit more since it won't be affective if she uses too little. I have been using this for a couple a months now and it has made a drastic change in my hair. My hair felt dead before I bought this product, but after applying a bit every time I wet my hair, my hair now feels completely silky:))
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Not for my hair
customer_reviews.text: When reviewing hair products, the most important thing is to specify your hair type. I have curly, for real curly not scrunched, 2c & 3A curls. My hairs is Caucasian and it is not thin but fine, postpartum hair. I also have low porosity hair. This product just weight my hair down so much. My curls were dead. It went back.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff!! Don’t hesitate- just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff! I have tried a ton of hair products for my 2c hair. It’s thick and coarse, can be frizzy and unruly. This stuff tames it! My hair is softer, less frizzy and it doesn’t leave any residue or buildup. The scent is a nice light coconut smell. I don’t see much difference regarding the length of time it takes to dry. But I wasn’t expecting much in that respect. A little does go a long way but even when I’ve used “too much” its not even that bad. It actually seems to help with humidity protection when use too much!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Trebilcock

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Terrible Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product, it moisturizers my hair and keeps frizz at a minimum. I would even go as far as saying that it is the BEST leave in product I’ve encountered so far on my Curly Girl journey. But this packaging? Horrible! I have to tap and shake the bottle for five minutes before a small amount of product shoots out. I need a lot of it to make my hair work, and I’m going to end up taking the bottle apart and putting the product in a travel size container to be able to use it easily.
customer_reviews.author: My Cat Says Yes

customer_reviews.title: This product is the best for natural curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this product in high school. The style was long straight hair. There wasn't anything out there for natural curly hair. This has a GREAT light scent. You don't need much product. It works great & keeps those dreaded fly-away hairs & the Frizzies away. It doesn't way down your hair either 5 stars for this product. Don't ever change your product...it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Pump Won't Dispense Product
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday and went to use it today. Guess what? The dispenser doesn't work so I have no way of even trying product. I can't return it because I went to return it today and it says item in unreturnable. How is a defective item I receive my fault?! Also I see no way of contacting seller. I read on some of the reviews negative things about this seller. True or not I cannot say, but I will never buy from this seller again. So guess whose out the money....me!
customer_reviews.author: shakamar

customer_reviews.title: Don't know who packaged this item...but they should be fired!
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering these products for awhile through Amazon and this is the first time that I have ever been disappointed. See attached picture of how item arrived. Looks like some one took a utility knife and cut the top off. This is unacceptable!!! Can't even return it because it would just be "goo" in the bottom of the box like what I received and can't use it because the container was cut right below where the lid comes off and can't remove the lid to use the applicator. Won't be ordering these items again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie L

customer_reviews.title: Great product but bottle came broken
customer_reviews.text: This cams busted up in the packaging- the top part was disconnected from the bottle and I couldn’t get it to stay on in order to use the pump- so I just take the top off like it’s a lid and still use the product without the pump. I am giving it 4 stars though because the product is so good! I absolutely love the devacurl super cream as well as their other products!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylark

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a good product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been battling my wavy hair for years and finally found this product.. it's amazing! A little more pricy than I'd like, but some of the products that didn't work were much more expensive so I consider it money well spent. I don't use any of the other products in this line, but would definately consider giving them a try after the success I've had with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Elise MacBello

customer_reviews.title: Curly girlies rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and defines curls well! I would have continued to buy this product repeatedly - but recently shaved my head. All curly girls - this one's for you! Seriously the scent is like Skittles and candy! I lived being around myself LOL. Curly girlies rejoice!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFangirl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this 1 star do to the fact it came oppened and most of the product is all over the inside of the box. This stuff is very pricy, what a waste:(
customer_reviews.author: patricia hayes

customer_reviews.title: Really Disappointed... I can’t express my felling
customer_reviews.text: Product is good there was no issue, I have also ordered the more quantity. But I have a little bit disappointed with the product packaging. When I received this product, I show that the product is completely destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ REVIEW

customer_reviews.title: In constant rotation after my shower
customer_reviews.text: I love how the Supercream enhances my naturally wavy-curls. It defines them without adding extra "gunk". My hair is still soft to the touch and the frizz is kept at bay. The coconut smell is not overpowering. My husband despises coconut anything and has yet to complain about the scent of Deva Curl. I ordered with Prime delivery but the guaranteed date was a week later. I was pleasantly surprised when the cream came within 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: K.W.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok...not great on it's own.
customer_reviews.text: You definitely need another product to go with it like a gel or mousse because this product isn't enough to define and hold curls on its own. It does have a great scent, but I was disappointed that it doesn't define and hold curls better. Without an added gel or mousse on top of it, my hair is very frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: D. West

customer_reviews.title: Not good for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I have super curly but also very fine hair and this doesn't work for me. I've tried using it many times and cannot get it right. I either use too much and my hair is weighed down/greasy OR i use way too little and have no control. I'm a loyal deva curl light defining gel and the mist-er right user but i just don't think this one is right for my hair. Love the smell though!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Deising

customer_reviews.title: glad i found this product
customer_reviews.text: I already use deva curl shampoo, conditioner, gel and now I add this to my gel while in shower. since letting my hair grow out to its natural silver, it is a different texture and needs more moisture. a little goes a long way, but keeps my curls soft and not frizzy. do not over do it though if you have fine hair as it can be too much, but a little works magic
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Sandison

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This product caused my head to itch for 5 days after using only twice. Also, the seller will not permit you to return the item. STAY AWAY from this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for curls!
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, curly hair and this product gives me the right amount of support for my curls. So many other "curl" creams are just too light to give me the hold I need. Than there are the creams or gels that just make my hair crunchy and stiff. This is the best one I've found in years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Hair is Falling & Dry
customer_reviews.text: I own almost all of DevaCurl products and I only use DevaCurl and no other brand. I have been using their products for 5 years. I loved them until it made my hair super dry, brittle, and fallout in big chunks. I'm not sure which product is causing this exactly but I stopped using products from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sara A.

customer_reviews.title: Hair stylist recommended it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Every time after I wash my hair, I would pump a quarter-size amount into my palm and gently rub into my hair when it's half wet. The curls immediately show and are better maintained. The key is to air dry the hair after using the cream. I think the bottle will last me for quite some time. The subtle coconut smell is also pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for wavy hair
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, I have wavy hair, not terribly curly. If I want to straighten it, this product helps. If I want to boost the curl, it does the job. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Family

customer_reviews.title: I have fine curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I have fine curly hair. I have always used the Devacurl be leave in gel plumper and love the volume it gives to my curls. It I was looking for something that would not leave that crunchy feeling in my hair. I had high Hope's for this product but I have to say I really dont like it. The cream seems to weigh down my curls and even when using just a tiny drop it leaves a greasy feeling in my hair all day. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: It's a curly staple in this house.
customer_reviews.text: My son and I both have curly hair. We have been using this for years. Provides good control and some definition on waves and curls. Also great for day 3 or 4 curl freshen with some water spritz. If i want a lot of definition i use this with devacurl gel. Its a staple.
customer_reviews.author: LaNay

customer_reviews.title: Favorite curl product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product, it makes my hair smell super good and controls my curls without making my hair crunchy. It conditions as well and leaves my hair light and frizz free all day. Next day all I have to do is wet my hair and the product continues to work. 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chris k

customer_reviews.title: Need to use a lot of it at a time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the Deva Curl styling cream but thought I’d try the Super Cream after reading the reviews. I’m disappointed. I have long medium curls and thick hair. I have to use twice as much of the Super Cream (2 pumps) to get the same control as I do with the Styling Cream (1 pump). I don’t love the coconut scent either, I prefer the sweeter scent of the other one. It works ok but I’ll go back to the styling cream once it’s gone
customer_reviews.author: ChrisOH

customer_reviews.title: Love affair for your curls!
customer_reviews.text: I can't even begin to describe how amazing this product is. Where was this when I was a teen trying to tame my wayward curls?! It sculpts your curls but for real makes them touchably soft. I bit heavy but just go light at first to figure out how much you need. 1 to 2 pumps is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Too thick for my hair
customer_reviews.text: This smelled lovely but it was too thick and it took forever to work into my hair. It took too long to dry and when it finally did it felt dry. It was defined nicely but i did Like how my hair felt. Product was too thick for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Gippi

customer_reviews.title: A must for curly hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Doesn’t leave any residue when it dries down. I had been using Cantu but i would always get a white residue in my hair that I really hated. I had seen in some reviews people not getting actual deva curl products and this was a legit product, no issues with it leaking or arriving damaged either! Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fox

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice product. It’s not oily but it does have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product. It’s not oily but it does have a The softener no effect that oil might have on hair. You don’t need any other product with this. It leaves your hair softly curled, bouncy and airy. Not crunchy at all. If you do want to ad more definition you can mix it with the devacurl foaming mouse. Wonderful product. I have 3b curls and I only use devacurl products. I just with these products were more affordable but they very well can charge this much because it works! 😝
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Item Listed is not what I received.
customer_reviews.text: The item listed states "DevaCurl SuperCream Coconut Curl Styler" but what I received is the "DevaCurl Styling Cream". Picture is attached. I kept this because I am able to use it and had no time to wait on a replacement. It would be nice for someone to check the accuracy of the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weighs down my hair, undefined the natural curls I have.
customer_reviews.text: I am a black woman with naturally curly hair and extra fluffy when wet. I usually choose light conditioners, such as Pantene because it does not weigh down my hair, Phelps define my curls, and smells good. I was hoping that this product would be nice to follow up with after rinsing my conditioner but I need to throw it in the trash ASAP. It weighs down my hair, causing my curls to not be as defined as they were before I added the product. My natural curly styles do not look good after using this. The only good thing about this product is it’s smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amira Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Won’t be without this product!
customer_reviews.text: OMG love this product. I have wavy hair and this creates curls, no need for styling other than scrunching and then running my fingers through my hair when dry. Looks even better the second day when I use a small amount of product on my dry hair.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Jones

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but not overly impressed
customer_reviews.text: Great smell. Seems to soften curls and conditions but I still need a mousse or gel to get my best curls. Was hoping this would be more of an all in one product but if I don’t add mousse or gel, my curls are dry and frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have natural wave and some curl and a full head of super thick hair. I, have, forever been looking for a product that won't dry and leave my hair looking frizzy and/or crunchy. I use this DevaCurl along with Twirl Around Curl Definer and I now have BEAUTIFUL, healthy looking curls with little scrunching and NO crunch!! People have definately noticed. Thankful to have finally found a product that does what it is designed to do!! Best thing is, a little goes a long way and light, nice scent. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: J Rebel

customer_reviews.title: Is This Going to Make You Bald?
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this and mentioned to my sister. She told me about the current class-action lawsuit and controversy that DevaCurl is causing hair loss, bald spots, ruining curls, etc.. I couldn't believe it, but I looked it up and sure enough. You aren't allowed to return this if you bought it. I would guess they shut that down b/c so many people are trying to. So I can either throw away the $18 I spent, or roll the dice that it's going to ruin my hair. Not a hard decision, but I am really mad at DevaCurl and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: beebop

customer_reviews.title: Works On Thick Curly Hair
customer_reviews.text: Only four stars because it does itch at night like every other product I've used. I'm trying to use less of it and see if that helps while keeping my hair styled. But it's one of the few products which tames my frizzy, curly hair and makes it somewhat manageable throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette M. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Current favorite. Cant go without it anymore.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product I have found so far that actually helps tame my frizz (aside from gel, but I hate how tangled my hair gets with gel). I wasnt sure if this product was really doing anything until I forgot to put it on after a shower one day and my hair looked so frizzy and dry. I dont care for any of the other diva curl products, but this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Awesome products
customer_reviews.text: DevaCurls are high recommended! I no longer use heat tools, I just add the stilyng products and use the foam wires around my hair at the beginning when getting ready to mold my curls and once I’m finished getting ready I take the foam wires to reveal my curls
customer_reviews.author: Deisi MArtinez

customer_reviews.title: Very Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Very creamy, my hair soaked it right up, left my hair moisturized all day. It gave my curls moisture and volume, shrinkage is real, but not as noticeable as with other products. I give this a thumbs up. Gonna try it with the ultra gel to see if I can make this wash n go last a week. Just steam, fluff and go
customer_reviews.author: Jazzigyrl

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item received
customer_reviews.text: Was sent wrong item, got the touchable curl definer instead of coconut cream which I love. :( Policy says i cannot return this item so i will use it anyway. Tried it in past, don’t like the smell but it does moisturize the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Buybuy81

customer_reviews.title: LEADS TO HAIR LOSS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! I’ve been using it for years and have recently had issues with unexplained hair loss—I’m 26 years old and healthy. It was recently reported that there are thousands of cases of people using this product and losing hair. This product is not properly tested and the company is evading responsibility. I would never trust them.
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: My hair began to fall out
customer_reviews.text: After I began to use this product I noticed that my hair began to fall out in A considerably higher volume. First time, I did not click. But the third time I was able to connect the dots (thinking to myself this can’t be I heard amazing recommendations about this product). I took a break and my hair fall out is back to “normal”. I thought I was going to loose my entire hair in these 3 washes after using this product. Waste of money and very disappointing as this was my first time ever using Deva Curl product! My hair is wild and easy to please. I can’t believe how it responded to this product- horribly- sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Caroliny Moura

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Deva Curl products
customer_reviews.text: LOVE Deva Curl products, this is a great cream if used correctly. I have naturally curly hair so I do not need a lot of products in my hair just to define the curls. I use this with the devacurl light defining gel and I do not use a lot of it.
customer_reviews.author: elo715

customer_reviews.title: This brand is AMAZING for curly hair of ALL TYPES
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product does not weigh my hair down and does in fact reduce the frizz. DevaCurl is the most effective and trustworthy brand out there. Moreover, this product works for wavy, curly, super curly, and coily hair it helps moisturize and tame frizzy hair. Not to mention the fact that it smells wonderful! You won't find it for a better price, as it usually goes for about 24 dollars in stores like Ulta and the official DevaCurl site. All in all I will never stop using this specific product, it leaves my hair soft, frizz free and smelling amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive if you have thick hair
customer_reviews.text: I have thick hair, with type 3b curls. The creme worked well, but only if I used a lot - about 20 pumps. Anything less, and my hair was pure frizz. It would take 3 or 4 of these per month for my hair, so I switched to the ultra hold gel.
customer_reviews.author: CBA

customer_reviews.title: Turns my fine, frizzy curls into smooth, bouncy ringlets
customer_reviews.text: I have combination 3a/3b hair that is very fine. This product largely eliminates the frizz and makes my curls look like bouncy ringlets. It works best when you put it on your hair when wet and scrunch it up towards your roots and then dry it with a diffuser. There are great youtube videos on how to use the product. After trying this, I stopped using other curly hair products and am now a DevaCurl fan.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda O.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I've had curly hair my whole life obviously this product was supposed to be amazing and designed specifically for curly hair. DO NOT buy this stuff. It will make your hair dry and BRITTLE. it is not a curly hair friendly product. I wouldn't recommend it for ANYONE. Buyer BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Review away

customer_reviews.title: Let your curly Goddess rock!
customer_reviews.text: I have fine to medium textured type 3b curl's and this is my secret weapon for defined curls in the Puget Sound. I combine a pea sized amount with my Arc Angel gel. I've got curls for miles now! Second day I can add another pea sized dab to wet hand's and scrunch for instant hair renewall. I love this stuff <3
customer_reviews.author: Moss Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, finally found something to tame my curls. I have been ordering the product online for some time, it usually arrives in the box wrapped a bubble wrap and in working order. This order arrived broken with no bubble wrap. I would like a refund or a new bottle of product as this cannot be returned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and I don't believe it's the real product.
customer_reviews.text: Like others have mentioned, my order of this product also arrived with the top coming off. I decided to use it anyway because I was out of the product and in the past it's kept my unruly and curly hair tamed. This is DEFINITELY NOT DevaCurl SuperCream. It looks like the product, but it does not smell or act like the product. It leaves my hair greasy and limp. :( I will not be purchasing this product from Amazon again, back to Ulta I go.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Koestner

customer_reviews.title: Loving it! My hair is very thick with tight ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving it! My hair is very thick with tight tight curls, and is very dry. The decadence gives me more moisture than all the other products.
customer_reviews.author: RoC

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and does the same as other products
customer_reviews.text: I finally broke down and spent the extra money for this product after hearing so much about it. I have nothing really bad to say about the product, it worked good and did what it was supposed to do. But I also use other products from the drug store that I felt had the same effect if not a little better on my hair and are half the cost or cheaper. It is good for curls, didn’t do much for my frizz but I just don’t feel that it is worth the prices that they have on their products
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: works well but...
customer_reviews.text: it's too expensive for the price. I use a lot of other DevaCurl products and this is the one that is the LEAST bang for your buck. I've found other options to use instead.
customer_reviews.author: KSZ

customer_reviews.title: Greasy
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this product and loved it so I ordered a bottle and oddly, it's not the same. This is so greasy that I have to shampoo daily (usually shampoo 2x/wk) and it still never comes out. For reference, I don't even use one full pump. Unfortunately, they dont accept returns so I am out $18 which went to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany D Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I had great expectations after reading some of the reviews but was greatly disappointed... Unfortunately, this product does not have great hold and it left my curls undefined and dry. It's not crunchy at all, which is a plus, but that's the only thing it has going for it :(
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: A bit heavy, but great stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff, but I don't need to use it as much as I had expected because of other products I have. Still, I am glad to have it on hand. It is a little heavier than what I like, but it serves it purpose when I want that extra hold.
customer_reviews.author: TAT

customer_reviews.title: Stop Using!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this leave in for over 4 years, over the course of that time I noticed my curl pattern drastically changing, and my hair was falling out by the chunks. I did not correlate it to this product as I thought it was related to diet, stress and hormones but all along it was this terrible product, I also realized I was not alone! There are thousands of people talking about it and a pending law suite over their entire product line.
customer_reviews.author: Bgeb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing curls using a very little bit of this
customer_reviews.text: I use this and the other curl cream from this brand. I love both of them so much. They smell amazing and don’t leave a heavy product residue. I have extra long hair that’s always dyed hot pink and can use the extra mouisture. This product helps keep the frizz away. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Aahz-Milligan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite curl cream and I have tried a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Best curl cream so far. My old favorite was “Samy Curls” but now is out of production Follow directions for use, apply to wet hair. Curls dry beautifully and are soft to the touch. You will love.
customer_reviews.author: Heiser Family

customer_reviews.title: Crazy curly!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using DC products since April 2019, and figured I’d give the super cream a try. I LOVE IT! My curls are definitely better defined and moisturized when I use this product. The scent is pleasant and the cream dries down well without leaving residue which is important to me! Highly recommend for all curly girls!
customer_reviews.author: V4short

customer_reviews.title: Curls without Frizz
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a product that truly curls the hair and takes out the frizz! Wash hair, dry and scrunch, apply DivaCurl (generous amount), scrunch again and medium length hair drys with frizzless curls!
customer_reviews.author: Emma the Cat

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy product that caused me to have severe scalp itch
customer_reviews.text: This product make my scalp itch severely. Upon researching, I learned that Deva Curl uses formaldehyde as a preservative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but very small size for price
customer_reviews.text: It worked pretty damn good in my hair. Did a great job of defining my curls but only if I blew it dry w diffuser (which it instructs you to do). My only negative thing is you really don't get any bang for your buck. I have thick hair but its short, above my shoulders and this lasted me not even 20 styles. (I ran out in less than a month). I love it but its just not a pocket friendly option for me and unfortunately, I'm ballin on a budget lol.
customer_reviews.author: calyn kuiper

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming!
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair with natural fingerwaves. This product didn't seem to do anything but weight my hair down and I lost some wave. Hair was still frizzy. I tried different amounts, different wetness and even dry hair application with no success.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina W.

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair too heavy + caused a breakout
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few weeks ago and was so excited because I've heard a lot of good things about Deva Curl. However, I'm not a big fan. It makes my hair weighed down and dirty feeling after one day of use (usually I can wash my hair once a week, even with using product in between). It also caused my face to breakout. So, all around not impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: hsd1234

customer_reviews.title: good for frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: I have fine frizzy wavy hair with some curls in some parts of my head (more on the back). This cream makes me have curls all over, and they dont look frizzy after I put the cream on my wet hair. I like the smell and texture (feels like normal hair texture in my opinion.. not "crunchy"). Overall I like the product a lot but I also think it's a bit too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: K

product_meta.title: DevaCurl SuperCream Coconut Curl Styler, 5.1oz
feature_bullets: SUPERCREAM COCONUT CURL STYLER: This Curl Styler works wonders for curly and super curly hair that craves silky moisture, definition, and curl control. This styling cream can be used on wet, damp, and day-old curls.

SUPERCREAM STYLER DOES IT ALL: This rich, coconut oil-infused styler gives you total freedom to express yourself with your curls. Whether you want to smooth, soften, shape, lengthen, moisturize, define, control, boost volume, twist-out, tame frizz, add shine or switch-up your look, this SuperCream can handle it.

HOW TO USE COCONUT CREAM: Section your wet hair & apply to each section. Glide through each section to elongate your curls. For dense curls keep the sections small. Use on damp hair for more volume and shake at the root. Add this cream to your ends to seal in moisture. Use on second-day hair to add bounce & refresh your curls.
COCONUT CURL STYLER SUPERCREAM: Built around the addictive creaminess of coconut, SuperCream is bright, lush, and luxurious.
DEVACURL PROMISE: All DevaCurl products are 100% sulfate, paraben and silicone-free. They are also vegan, wheat, and cruelty-free.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,430 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
